name: Heart Brawl
description:
You're having a splendid date, but all of a sudden bad thoughts are approaching. Guess you gotta fight them!

This game was made for Mini Jam 92: Death - itch.io.

In terms of the Jams theme (Death), you die of heartbreak.

Must be played in Fullscreen. (Because I didn't get it to work without it)

NOTES

  • The game gets harder over time. (Enemies and Hearts get faster, you take more damage)
  • This was made in like 14 Hours. 
  • If someone  should wonder the background character (date) doesn't have a specific gender.
